transportAdvice: Boston has an extensive subway and bus network that connects most major tourist areas, making it easy to get around without a car. The historic downtown and waterfront districts are very walkable, and taxis as well as ride-hailing services are widely available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cold and often snowy, with freezing temperatures and occasional winter storms making warm layers essential.
One of the coldest months, with persistent cold and a mix of snow and rain likely throughout.
Early spring brings gradually warming days but temperatures remain chilly and rain becomes more frequent.
Mild and increasingly pleasant, though showers are common and temperatures can still dip at night.
Comfortable spring weather with blooming greenery, though occasional rain showers are still expected.
Warm and humid with long daylight hours, making it a popular time to explore the city outdoors.
The hottest month, with high humidity and warm evenings; afternoon thunderstorms are possible.
Still hot and humid with conditions similar to July, though temperatures begin to ease toward month's end.
Pleasant early autumn with cooler, comfortable temperatures and gradually decreasing humidity.
Crisp fall weather with spectacular foliage colors, making it one of the most scenic months to visit.
Temperatures drop noticeably and rain is frequent, with the first frost possible by late in the month.
Cold and wintry with a chance of snow, though the festive holiday atmosphere makes the city lively.
